com.zhukovsd.graphs.embedded

Class Face

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.graphs.embedded.Face

  • public class Face
extends java.lang.Object
    Face is the part of plain, bounded by edges

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Face> adjacentFaceList
      Faces of same graph, which has one or multiple common edges with current graph.
      java.util.List<Edge> edgeList
      Edges, which bounds current face.
      java.util.List<Vertex> vertexList
      Vertexes, which lays in corners of current faces.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Face

        Face(java.util.List<Edge> edgeList)
        Create face by list of edges bounding it.
        Parameters:
        edgeList - list of edges. Constructor expects that edges in this list forms cycle, i.e. each next edge's source is previous edge's destination

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Get string representation for current face. If all it's vertexes has tags, result is concatenation of all this tags.

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
